item.title: Today's Prayer
item.description: June 13, 2024 Today's Verse Matthew 18:21–22 [21] Then Peter came up and said to him, “Lord, how often will my brother sin against me, and I forgive him? As many as seven times?” [22] Jesus said to him, “I do not say to you seven times, but seventy-seven times. Today's Memory Verse James 1:22 - But be doers of the word, and not hearers only, deceiving yourselves. John 14:6 - Jesus said to him, “I am the way, and the truth, and the life.
